name: aled-monorepo
description: ALed интернет-магазин светодиодной продукции - полнофункциональный монорепозиторий

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "pnpm --filter api dev" "pnpm --filter admin dev" "pnpm --filter frontend dev"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter shared build && pnpm --filter api build && pnpm --filter admin build && pnpm --filter frontend build
scripts.build:api: pnpm --filter shared build && pnpm --filter api build
scripts.build:admin: pnpm --filter shared build && pnpm --filter admin build
scripts.build:frontend: pnpm --filter shared build && pnpm --filter frontend build
scripts.setup: pnpm install && pnpm docker:up && sleep 5 && pnpm db:migrate && pnpm db:seed
